hero.title: Hi, I'm Jackson kitsao!
hero.des1: I am a NextJs, Node and Rust developer with a strong interest in web development and web performance.
hero.des2: I have a wide range of experience in both backend and frontend development, and I am always keen to learn new technologies and improve my skills. I am a quick learner and have a good eye for detail, which makes me an asset to any team. I am also a good communicator and have a strong work ethic. My technology stack includes React, Nextjs, Nodejs, Redis, MongoDB express and Microservises.
hero.des3: I am also currently learning more about Cloud infrastructure, Game development, Distributed systems and Machine learning.
